item.title: Meta Platforms Inc 10-K
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc, which is in the Services-Computer Programming, Data Processing, Etc. [7370] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 02, 2023 had 42573 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: products - 429 instances may - 413 instances 2022 - 354 instances data - 311 instances business - 282 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
